quotes.quote: Smash the control images. Smash the control machine.
Life is rapid, art is slow, occasion coy, practice fallacious, and judgment partial.
We crash into each other just so we can feel something.
We will not have any more crashes in our time.
Smashing heads does not open minds.
It is wise to direct your anger towards problems - not people; to focus your energies on answers - not excuses.
We have so much time and so little to do. Strike that, reverse it.
You can't take a crash course in serenity.
You never know what's gonna be a hit.
So rapid is the flight of dreams upon the wings of imagination.
If people concentrated on the really important things in life, there'd be a shortage of fishing poles.
You take a crash, you get back up and next time you succeed and that's a great feeling.
To never see a fool you lock yourself in your room and smash the looking-glass.
Each of us is born with a box of matches inside us but we can't strike them all by ourselves
Hit hard, hit fast, hit often!
A crash really occurs when you suddenly have a violent downturn in the market that then heralds a long bull market.
It is hard to smash a computer when you're laughing.
To hit bottom is to fall from grace.
